Other Modules
===============

typing_redirect
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
The `typing_redirect` module allows usage of Python 3.12 features
without breaking support for 3.8 or requiring a dependency on `typing-extensions`.

.. automodule:: bytemaker.typing_redirect
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:


utils
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Various helper functions/classes
(:py:class:`bytemaker.utils.Trie`, :py:class:`bytemaker.utils.classproperty`, :py:meth:`bytemaker.utils.instance_of_union`, etc.) exposed for general use.

.. automodule:: bytemaker.utils
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
